title: Local Forest No. 42: Kawena (Cessation) Order, 2017
content:
11thAugust,2017 Statutory Instruments 469
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.63 OF 2017
The Forests Act, 2015
(ActNo.4of 2015)
The Local Forest No. 42: Kawena (Cessation) Order,
2017
INEXERCISE ofthepowerscontainedinsection17oftheForests
Act,2015,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. ThisOrdermaybecitedastheLocalForestNo.42:Kawena Title
(Cessation)Order,2017.

KawenaintheGovernmentNoticeNo.263of1954anddeclared ceasetobe
localforest
tobe aLocal Forest inthe SecondScheduletothe LocalForests
(Declaration)Order,1975, shallceasetobeaLocalForestfrom S.I.No.66
